original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā attano aneke pāpake akusale dhamme pahīne paccavekkhamāno nisinno hoti, aneke ca kusale dhamme bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gate.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhagavā attanaḥ aneke pāpake akusale dhamme pahīne paccavekkhamāno nisinnaḥ hoti aneke ca kusale dhamme bhāvanā pāripūrim gate

original: Atha kho bhagavā attano aneke pāpake akusale dhamme pahīne viditvā aneke ca kusale dhamme bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gate tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā attanaḥ aneke pāpake akusale dhamme pahīne viditvā aneke ca kusale dhamme bhāvanā pāripūrim gate tāyam velāyam imam udānaṃ udānesi
na ca āhu na ca bhavissati
